name: Digital Shadows
description: The Digital Shadows SearchLight App allows users to create flexible and dynamic playbooks that fully harness the capabilities provided by the Digital Shadows SearchLight API

ds_api_key.description: The account key of the Digital Shadows portal that is used to configure this app

ds_api_secret_key.description: A secured key that is linked with the API key used to configure this app

private_incident.description: A private incident is an event that could lead to loss of, or disruption to, an organization's operations, services, or functions

global_incident.description: A global incident is a type of event that can remotely lead to the loss of an organization's resources

history_days_interval.description: Historical days for which data needs to be polled by the application. Example input: 10 (for last 10 days data)

inc_typ_data_leakage.description: The severity of Data Leakage incident is based on the observation that sensitive client systems information, with credentials, is publicly available

inc_typ_brand_protection.description: Brand Protection is a type of incident in which attackers impersonate domains, social accounts, people, and mobile applications

inc_typ_infrastructure.description: Infrastructure incident occurs when an internal network protocol is exposed to the internet

inc_typ_physical_security.description: Physical Security incident occurs when the certificate of a domain has security issues

inc_typ_social_media_compliance.description: Social Media Compliance incident consists of exploiting secured information such as passwords on social media

inc_typ_cyber_threat.description: Cyber Threat incident usually consists of a company's account information to be sold and accessed by unauthorized personnel

actions.description: Validate connection to the Digital Shadows API
Callback action for the 'on_poll' ingest functionality

start_time.description: Start of the polling time range for which the app will fetch all the events after this time. It should be in epoch time (milliseconds). Example - 1611587778000

end_time.description: End of the polling time range for which the app will fetch all the events before this time. It should be in epoch time (milliseconds). Example - 1611587778000

actions.description: Search across all Digital Shadow's entities including incidents, threat profiles, and our closed data stores

date_range.description: Date Range. Example input: P30D(for Past 30 Days)

actions.description: Retrieve a single incident and its details, identified by its unique integer identifier
Search incidents based on filters. The On Poll action also uses this endpoint to collect incidents for a given time range/interval

date_range.description: Incident Date Range. Example input: P30D(for Past 30 Days)

actions.description: Retrieve the history of all review submissions for a given incident, ordered by submission time with the most recent submission first
Post a status update to the incident along with a note

render.title: Digital Shadows Incident Review by ID

actions.description: Meant to be a simple way to search Intelligence Incidents based on time range and incident types if needed

date_range.description: Intelligence Incident Date Range. Example input: P30D(for Past 30 Days)

actions.description: Retrieve a single intelligence incident and its details, identified by its unique integer identifier
Retrieve the indicators of compromise associated with an intelligence incident

intel_incident_id.description: Digital Shadows Intelligence Incident IoCs ID

render.title: Digital Shadows Get intelligence Incident IoCs

actions.description: Search across all data breaches that are relevant to your organization

date_range.description: Data Breach Date Range. Example input: P30D(for Past 30 Days)

actions.description: Retrieve a single data breach and its details, identified by its unique integer identifier. The records associated with the breach must be retrieved using a separate operation
Search data breach records across all data breaches. This operation also includes basic information about the data breach the record occurred within

date_range.description: Data Breach record Date Range. Example input: P30D(for Past 30 Days)

domain_names.description: Data Breach record domain names (comma separated). Example input: 'xyz.com, abc.org'

render.title: Digital Shadows Get Data Breach Records

actions.description: Retrieve breach records (credentials) for a specific breach

render.title: Digital Shadows Get Data Breach Record

actions.description: This action allows you to search breach records based on the domain, review status, or full/partial strings from the username

published_date_range.description: Published Date Range. Example input: P30D(for Past 30 Days)

review_statuses.description: Review Statuses (comma separated). Example: open, read, closed

output.column_name: Data Breach Record Published Date Range

actions.description: Retrieve the list of review status updates for a given data breach record
Update an individual breach record's notes or status using this action

review_note.description: Update an individual breach record's notes using this action

review_status.description: Update an individual breach record's status using this action

render.title: Digital Shadows Breach Record Review by ID
